info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:34AM CDT until May 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN HOCKLEY AND SOUTHERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 1234 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pep, or 11 miles southwest of Littlefield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Anton, Sudan, Amherst, Fieldton, Spade, Whitharral and Pep. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
